test.description: api.info.contact with incorrect name property type is invalid

errors: Invalid property type at api/info/contact/name - expected: string, actual: object

test.description: api.info.contact with incorrect url property type is invalid

errors: Invalid property type at api/info/contact/url - expected: string, actual: object

test.description: api.info.contact with incorrect url property format is invalid

test.description: api.info.contact with incorrect email property type is invalid

test.description: api.info.contact with incorrect email property format is invalid

errors: Invalid format for property value at api/info/contact/email - expected: email (e.g. support@example.com), actual: invalid email address
